CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 13, 1953, pg. 10 reads: "Charity Club Gives Tea - Shown at their Kay Club tea are several members of the top-flight Victory Charity Club which celebrated its ninth such event last Sunday. Smiling prettily for the cameraman are, seated, Mrs. Rosa Walker, club treasurer, and leader of the winning team, Mrs. Lucy Matthews.  Standing are Mrs. Catherine Simonson, chairman of the finance committee; pianist Ruby Young Buchanan, Mrs. Alberta Jones, secretary of finance committee, and club founder-president Mrs. Viola Sams. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of six Victory Charity Club members, from left, seated: Rosa Walker and Lucy Matthews; standing: Catherine Simonson, Ruby Young Buchanan, Alberta Jones, and Viola Sams, posed in Kay Boys Club for tea event
